title: Unable to Login with Landline Internet, but can with Mobile HotSpot
body:
it just goes straight to "did not connect to server; Attempt 1,2,3"  
but i can log on with my Mobile hotspot. 
does anyone know how to fix this, if it is a problem with my landline internet?

replies.body: Theirs already like 7 threads on the goddamn issue, post in one of those.

Cheers. Looking into it now.
Everything looks unresolved though.
